title._content: Ryder's Pond (Strome Kill), Old Cedar, West Side of Pond, Brooklyn, ca. 1899-1909.

description._content: Daniel Berry Austin (American, born 1863, active 1899-1909). Ryder's Pond (Strome Kill), Old Cedar, West Side of Pond, Brooklyn, ca. 1899-1909. Dry plate negative. Prints, Drawings and Photographs. Brooklyn Museum/Brooklyn Public Library, Brooklyn Collection, 1996.164.1-76. (1996.164.1-76_IMLS_SL2.jpg) Help us geotag this photograph so we can represent Brooklyn on Historypin.
